edu.jhu.nlp.wikipedia
Class WikiTextParser

java.lang.Object
  edu.jhu.nlp.wikipedia.WikiTextParser

public class WikiTextParser
extends java.lang.Object

For internal use only -- Used by the WikiPage class. Can also be used as a stand alone class to parse wiki formatted text.
